column6: The master of magnetism has taken over a missile base, and only the strangest teens of all time stand between him and victory! It's the X-Men's first day of class, and Magneto wants to make it a memorable one - and their last!
column8: | inker:Sol Brodsky | inker:Paul Reinman | penciller (cover):Jack Kirby | editor:Stan Lee | letterer:Sam Rosen
